description: Erection of single storey extension (timber canopy) to west elevation to create a cafe, alterations to front facade to south-west elevation, new ramp to property and relocation of entrance door.
subdivision_of_building: Ground floor lobby space, outdoor terrace
decision_conditions:
The development hereby permitted must be begun not later than the expiration of three years beginning with the date of this permission.


REASON: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).

<p>Detailed drawings/full particulars of the proposed development showing the matters set out below must be submitted to and approved by the Local Planning Authority, in writing, before the relevant work commences. The development shall not be carried out otherwise than in accordance with the details thus approved which shall be implemented in full prior to the first occupation/use of the development and retained in perpetuity.&nbsp;</p><p>(i) Colour of canopy;&nbsp;</p><p>(ii) Details of cycle storage;</p><p>(iii) Details of external lighting;</p><p>(iv) Details of any CCTV equipment;</p><p>REASON:&nbsp;<span style="background-color: transparent; font-family: Arial; white-space-collapse: preserve;">To ensure that the external appearance of the building is satisfactory and does not detract from the character and visual amenity of the area.</span></p>

<p><span style="font-family: Arial;">Details of bin and recycling enclosures showing the design, and external appearance, shall be submitted to and approved by the Local Planning Authority, in writing, before the use commences. The development shall not be carried out otherwise than in accordance with the details thus approved.</span><br style="font-family: Arial; font-size: 16px;"><br style="font-family: Arial; font-size: 16px;"><span style="font-family: Arial;">REASON: In order to provide for adequate bin and recycling enclosures in the interest of the appearance of the site and area.</span></p>

<p>The Cafe use hereby permitted may only operate between the hours of 08:00 and 22:00 Monday-Saturday and 09:00 -21:00 on Sunday.</p><p><br></p><p>REASON:&nbsp;&nbsp;<span style="background-color: transparent; font-family: Arial; white-space-collapse: preserve;">To ensure that the use is operated in a satisfactory manner and does not unduly disturb adjoining occupiers or prejudice local amenity generally.</span></p>

<p>In the event that any lighting columns are damaged during construction, these must be replaced like for like at the cost of the developer/applicant.&nbsp;&nbsp;</p><p>Reason: To ensure that the area retains adequate lighting provision required by TfL.&nbsp;</p>

The Development hereby permitted shall only be carried out and completed strictly in accordance with the submitted plans hereby approved and any subsequent approval of details.


REASON: To ensure that the development hereby permitted is carried out in full accordance with the plans hereby approved.

<p>No development shall take place until a detailed Construction Management Plan covering the matters set out below has been submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority. The development shall only be implemented in accordance with the details and measures approved as part of the construction management plan, which shall be maintained throughout the entire construction period.&nbsp;</p><p>(i) Details of the location where deliveries will be undertaken;</p><p>(ii) the size and number of lorries expected to access the site daily;</p><p>(iii) the access arrangements (including turning provision if applicable);</p><p>(iv) construction traffic routing; and&nbsp;</p><p>(v) details of parking suspensions (if required) and the duration of construction.</p><p>REASON: To avoid hazard and obstruction being caused to users of the public highway and in the interest of public safety and amenity.</p>

<p dir="ltr" style="margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; line-height: 1.2;"><span style="font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; font-variant-position: normal; font-variant-emoji: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space-collapse: preserve;">A tree protection method statement stating how all parts of the neighbouring tree(s) to the west of the site would be protected throughout the development process shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the commencement of works and the development shall be carried out in accordance with the approved details.</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; line-height: 1.2;"><span id="docs-internal-guid-5606f2e8-7fff-3c82-c4d3-d8062b38b50e"><br></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; line-height: 1.2;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; font-variant-position: normal; font-variant-emoji: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space-collapse: preserve;"><span style="font-size: 14px;">Reason: In order to protect the existing tree during building operations</span>.</span></p>

<p>An application for the following pruning works will need to be submitted to the Local Planning Authority prior to the&nbsp; commencement of any work at the site:- R<span style="background-color: transparent; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-style: italic; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space-collapse: preserve;">educe the crown by approximately 2.0m. Crown raised over the application site to provide a clearance of 4m from ground level.</span><span style="background-color: transparent; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space-collapse: preserve;">&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></p><p>REASON: In the interests of the protection of the tree and the amenity of the area generally.&nbsp;</p>

<p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;background-color:#ffffff;margin-top:10pt;margin-bottom:0pt;padding:0pt 0pt 10pt 0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial,sans-serif;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">Detailed specification of at least one suitable sustainable drainage systems (i.e. water butt, raingarden, bioretention planter box, living roof (substrate depth of 80-150mm excluding the vegetative mat), permeable paving, etc.) shall be submitted to, and approved by the LPA, in consultation with the LLFA. </span></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-fe99aa49-7fff-5f49-b410-2a4da929dcb9"></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.44;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial,sans-serif;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">REASON: </span><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial,sans-serif;color:#000000;background-color:#ffffff;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">To protect and where possible enhance biodiversity leading to a net gain.&nbsp;</span></p>
